translations: n．前部，前面：指物体或空间的前部或前面。
· The fore of the ship was damaged.
adv．在前面：表示在前面或向前。
· He walked with his hands in his pockets, his head bent fore.
他双手插兜，头低着向前走。
adj．前面的，前部的：位于前面或前部的。
· The fore wheels of the car are larger than the rear ones.

sentences.sentence: She has always been to the fore at moments of crisis.
sentences.translation: 在危急时刻她总是挺身而出。

sentences.sentence: The problem has come to the fore again in recent months.
sentences.translation: 近几个月来这个问题又成为热点。

sentences.sentence: There had been no direct damage in the fore part of the ship.
sentences.translation: 没有对船的前部造成直接损坏。
